name: Slider
description: A range input component with single or dual thumbs for value selection within min/max bounds

accessibility.screenReader: Announces current value, minimum, and maximum. Value changes are announced.

recommendedUsage: Use for selecting a value within a continuous range. Use range mode for selecting a range between two values.
antiPatterns: Do not use for precise numeric entry - use NumberInput instead. Avoid for discrete choices - use Radio or Select.
